channel.title: TidyTuesday.netlify.app
channel.description: Ronan's #TidyTuesday blog. Visualisations and analysis of various data sets created by the R for Data Science (R4DS) community

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: Ronan Harrington
item.description: Welcome to my TidyTuesday blog. This site features graphs and analysis of various data sets from the R for Data Science (R4DS) #TidyTuesday project.
